display_long_description:
# Madrid Noir is an interactive thriller in virtual reality.

🕵️ Fully immerse yourself in the story with comfortable interaction centered around narrative, appealing to cinema fans and VR enthusiasts alike.

[media]

**Embark on an adventure full of twists and turns as you relive Lola's childhood memories. As she returns to her uncle Manolo's apartment, declared dead to retrieve her belongings, some details seem suspicious.**

[media]

Discover Madrid Noir, by the creators of Gloomy Eyes, Battlescar, Wallace & Gromit in the Grand Getaway, and Mobile Suit Gundam Silver Phantom.

🕵️ Madrid Noir won the Emmy Award for Best Interactive Experience in 2022.
[media]
